value.title: Using different languages with the Power BI site
value.excerpt: I look at how your browser languages affect what is displayed. This all comes down to your browsers and the language settings within. Different browsers are configured differently. value.title: Why isn't my Agg hitting when using DISTINCTCOUNT in Power BI???
